title: I cannot setup visual voicemail. There is no option for it in settings.
content:
I cannot setup visual voicemail on my Pixel 4a using the google phone app. It used to work on my old Samsung phone, and I have confirmed with my carrier (Consumer Cellular) that it is still active on their end. I have tried several troubleshooting steps from community.

When I uninstall and resintall the phone app, I do see the icon for a split second before it disappears. There is no option in the phone app settings to enable or disable visual voicemail. How to I get visual voicemail to work on the pixel 4a?
